column4: after upgrade to lucid, looks i have 15 broken packages. can anybody help how to fix? list is here http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/1r06czZj
disable all ppas first then sudo apt-get update;sudo apt-get dist-upgrade dont confirm it just pastebin what you see after dist-upgrade
ppa's are disabled automatically during the upgrade. apt-get update and apt-get dist-upgrade has already been done
sudo apt-get install chromium-browser what does that show?
